post.summary: Posts a partial address to the service to be completed.

parameters.name: Auth-Token
parameters.description: Your unique key, called a token, that is required to submit an API request.

schema.description: Your unique key, called a token, that is required to submit an API request.

parameters.name: Reference-Id
parameters.description: Optional identifier that will be returned in the response to help you track the request.

schema.description: Optional identifier that will be returned in the response to help you track the request.

parameters.name: Timeout-Seconds
parameters.description: Maximum time you are prepared to wait for a response, expressed in seconds. Acceptable values: 2-15. If a timeout occurs, an HTTP status code of 408 - Request Timeout will be returned.

schema.description: Maximum time you are prepared to wait for a response, expressed in seconds. Acceptable values: 2-15. If a timeout occurs, an HTTP status code of 408 - Request Timeout will be returned.

unspecified: Level 6/549 St Kilda Rd, Melbourne VIC 3004

suggestions.text: Level 6  549 St Kilda Road, MELBOURNE  VIC 3004

parameters.name: Auth-Token
parameters.description: Your unique key, called a token, that is required to submit an API request.

schema.description: Your unique key, called a token, that is required to submit an API request.

parameters.name: Add-Metadata
parameters.description: Specifies if the response should return additional dataset-specific values, such as verbose validation data.

schema.description: Specifies if the response should return additional dataset-specific values, such as verbose validation data.

parameters.name: Add-Components
parameters.description: Specifies if the response should contain the address broken down into its components.

schema.description: Specifies if the response should contain the address broken down into its components.

parameters.name: Reference-Id
parameters.description: Optional identifier that will be returned in the response to help you track the request.

schema.description: Optional identifier that will be returned in the response to help you track the request.

parameters.name: Timeout-Seconds
parameters.description: Maximum time you are prepared to wait for a response, expressed in seconds. Acceptable values: 2-15. If a timeout occurs, an HTTP status code of 408 - Request Timeout will be returned.

schema.description: Maximum time you are prepared to wait for a response, expressed in seconds. Acceptable values: 2-15. If a timeout occurs, an HTTP status code of 408 - Request Timeout will be returned.

parameters.name: global_address_key
parameters.description: The ID of the address received as part of a previous fielded or intuitive search. Can be the global address key or the global_format_key.

schema.description: The ID of the address received as part of a previous fielded or intuitive search. Can be the global address key or the global_format_key.

type.description: A link to documentation that provides more details about the error you’ve encountered.

instance.description: The endpoint that returned the error.

ResponseError.description: Error model containing the error details.

address_line_1.description: The first line of address containing a number of specific components relating to the premises and street.

address_line_2.description: The second line of address containing a number of specific components relating to the premises and street.

address_line_3.description: The third line of address containing a number of specific components relating to the premises and street.

region.description: The city, state code or province.

AddressFormatV1Address.description: Seven address lines representing a formatted address for the chosen country.

full_name.description: Gets or sets the full name of the postal code.

primary.description: Gets or sets the primary name of the postal code.

secondary.description: Gets or sets the secondary name of the postal code.

full_name.description: The full name of the delivery service.

post_centre_name.description: The delivery service post center name.

full_name.description: The full name of this subcomponent.

AddressFormatV1SubBuildingItem.description: An item of sub-building information, such as a floor or entrance number or name.

name.description: The name of a building or property.

secondary_number.description: The secondary name of the building (if available).

allotment_number.description: The allotment name where a person or property resides.

department_name.description: The department name within an organization.

secondary_department_name.description: The secondary department name within an organization (if available).

full_name.description: The combination of the other populated secondary street components: prefix, name, type, suffix.
The full name of the route service.

AddressFormatV1LocalityItem.description: A single place name, code and a description of its type.

country_name.description: The name of the country where the address is located.
country_name.example: United States of America, United Kingdom

AddressFormatV1Components.description: The components that differ by country and address type. Note that parameters with blank values will not be returned.

global_address_key.description: The ID of the address received as part of a validation.

confidence.description: The confidence of address validation result.

AddressFormatV1Result.description: Information about the result. Includes the validated address and its confidence level.

umrrn.description: Royal Mail’s Unique Multiple Residence Reference Number, an eight-digit code linked to UDPRNs in Royal Mail’s Multiple Residence dataset.

udprn.description: Royal Mail’s Unique Delivery Point Reference Number, an eight-digit code assigned to every delivery point in the Postcode Address File (PAF).

dpid.description: Australia Post’s Delivery Point Identifier, an eight-digit number that uniquely identifies a physical location to which Australia Post delivers mail.

gnafpid.description: Geoscape Australia’s Geocoded National Address File Persistent Identifier (G-NAF ID)

AddressFormatV1IdsMetadata.description: The id metadata of formatted address.

number_of_households.description: Number of households for records in GBR Not Yet Built, or multi-occupancy count of the owning delivery point for GBR Multiple Residence.

delivery_type.description: Type of mail delivery at the address. Either "business" or "residential".

cmra_indicator.description: Indicates that the address is a private business that acts as a commercial mail-receiving agent for specific clients.

seed_indicator.description: Seed records are control records placed by the USPS to prevent unauthorized tampering (e.g., creation of lists containing every single delivery point in a geographical region). A seed address will deactivate DPV functionality. To re-activate, please visit the Self Service Portal.

dpv_indicator.description: Indicates whether selected address is confirmed as deliverable via DPV (Delivery Point Validation) process. For all possible values, please visit our technical documentation portal.

footnotes.description: USPS codes denoting DPV match levels. For a list of all possible values, please visit our technical documentation portal.

vacancy_indicator.description: An address known to be unoccupied for over 90 days and therefore not receiving mail deliveries.

no_stats_indicator.description: An address known to not receive mail deliveries (e.g. a house under construction).

pbsa_indicator.description: Indicates addresses known to be Post Office Box Street Addresses (PBSA).

AddressFormatV1DPV.description: Delivery Point Validation information for the address (USA only).

country_iso.description: The country ISO3 code of address.

location.description: Geographical location (latitude/longitude) to use as the center point for the search (USA only).

global_address_key.description: The ID of the address received as part of a validation.

text.description: The suggestion that should be presented to the user as a possible match to their input.

matched.description: A collection of the characters in the suggestion that have been matched. Integrators can use this information to highlight matched text.

format.description: The format URL of the suggested address.

dataset.description: The dataset of the suggested address.

more_results_available.description: To indicate that there are more suggestions available than the 7 results provided.

confidence.description: The outcome (confidence level) of the validation.

suggestions.description: A collection of the characters in the suggestion that have been matched. Integrators can use this information to highlight matched text.

AddressSearchV1Result.description: The result details - includes searched data and its confidence level.
